entry.def: A framework is a particular set of rules, ideas, or beliefs which you use in order to deal with problems or to decide what to do.

example.ex: ... within the framework of federal regulations.

entry.def: A framework is a structure that forms a support or frame for something.

means.word_mean: 1. a simplified description of a complex entity or process;

sentences.sentence: "the computer program was based on a model of the circulatory and respiratory systems"
"restoring the framework of the bombed building"
"it is part of the fabric of society"

means.word_mean: 3. a structure supporting or containing something

sentences.en: The block of office buildings was built of concrete on a steel framework.
